links.title: Browse Transcripts
links.tooltip: View HTML transcripts generated by claude-code-transcripts

panels.title: Sessions
panels.description: Unique sessions active in the selected time range

panels.title: Total Cost
panels.description: Cumulative API cost across all sessions

panels.title: Total Tokens
panels.description: Cumulative tokens across all sessions

panels.title: Active Time
panels.description: Total active coding time across all sessions

panels.title: Lines Changed
panels.description: Total lines added and removed across sessions

panels.title: Cache Hit %
panels.description: Cache read tokens divided by (cache read + input tokens)

panels.title: Avg Cost/Session
panels.description: Total cost divided by number of sessions

panels.title: Cost/Active Hour
panels.description: Total cost divided by total active coding hours

panels.title: Period Cost
panels.description: Total cost in the selected time range (compared to previous equivalent period)

panels.title: Cost vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in cost vs the previous period. Green ↓ = decrease, Red ↑ = increase.

panels.title: Period Tokens
panels.description: Total tokens consumed in the selected time range

panels.title: Tokens vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in tokens vs the previous period. Green ↓ = decrease, Red ↑ = increase.

panels.title: Period Sessions
panels.description: Number of unique sessions active in the selected time range

targets.expr: (count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) - count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0)) / clamp_min(count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0), 1) * 100 >= 0

-((count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) - count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0)) / clamp_min(count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0), 1) * 100) > 0

panels.title: Sessions vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in session count vs the previous period.

targets.expr: max by (session_id, project) (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:]))) * 1000

max by (session_id, project) (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:]))) > bool (time() - 300)

max by (session_id, project) ((max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0))

panels.title: All Sessions
panels.description: Recent sessions sorted by activity; click a session to drill in

panels.title: Cost Over Time
panels.description: Cost accrued per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Token Usage by Type
panels.description: Tokens consumed per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Token Usage by Model
panels.description: Tokens consumed per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Cache vs Input Tokens
panels.description: Tokens per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Cache Hit % Over Time
panels.description: Percentage of input tokens served from cache per interval

panels.title: Lines of Code (Added/Removed)
panels.description: Lines changed per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Commits & Pull Requests
panels.description: Total commits and pull requests in the selected time range

panels.title: Tool Usage Frequency
panels.description: Top tools by execution count from OTel tool_result events

panels.title: Tool Success / Failure
panels.description: Overall tool execution outcomes from OTel tool_result events

panels.title: Tool Decisions by Tool
panels.description: Accept and reject counts per tool from OTel tool_decision events

panels.title: Decision Sources
panels.description: How tool permission decisions are made (config, user_permanent, user_temporary, user_abort, user_reject)

panels.title: Avg Tool Duration
panels.description: Average tool execution time in ms from OTel tool_result events

targets.expr: sum by (language) (increase(claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total{decision="accept",project=~"$project"}[$__range])) or on (language) (0 * sum by (language) (increase(claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])))

sum by (language) (increase(claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total{decision="reject",project=~"$project"}[$__range])) or on (language) (0 * sum by (language) (increase(claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])))

panels.title: Tool Decisions by Language (Quality View)
panels.description: Per-language decision volume and acceptance quality in the selected time range.

targets.expr:
sum by (program) (count_over_time(
  {service_name="claude-code", project=~"$project"}
  | event_name="tool_result"
  | tool_name="Bash"
  | line_format "{{.tool_parameters}}"
  | json bash_command="bash_command"
  | line_format "{{.bash_command}}"
  | regexp `(?P<program>^\S+)`
  [$__auto]
))

panels.title: Most Used Commands
panels.description: Top CLI programs by execution count, extracted from Bash tool events.

targets.expr:
sum by (skill_name) (count_over_time(
  {service_name="claude-code", project=~"$project"}
  | event_name="tool_result"
  | tool_name="Skill"
  | line_format "{{.tool_parameters}}"
  | json skill_name="skill_name"
  | skill_name != ""
  [$__auto]
))

panels.title: Most Used Skills
panels.description: Top skills by execution count. Requires OTEL_LOG_TOOL_DETAILS=1 to capture skill names.

title: Claude Code Metrics
description: Overview of Claude Code usage across all sessions — cost, tokens, code activity, and tool usage.
